DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate impact milk-based nutrient-rich bar , specifically effect fortification zinc , iodine , vitamins A D calcium nutritional status school child , focus vitamin A , zinc , iodine , calcium iron status , cognitive performance .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Milk-based Nutrient-rich Bar Nutritional Status Cognitive Performance School Children Vietnam
DOC.detailed_description: Design : double-masked randomized control trial Place : three school South Vietnam , Can Tho district , South Vietnam Subjects : School child age 6 10 year old , first grade third grade 3 primary school . Duration intervention : 6 month ( consumption Goody `` control bar '' ) Study group : 2 group : Group 1 : child receive micronutrient enrich milk bar . Group 2 : child receive milk-based food except micronutrient fortification .
DOC.criteria: pupil one 2 select school , grade 1 3 weight height > 3 zscores hemoglobin concentration > 70 g/L weight height < 3 zscores hemoglobin concentration < = 70 g/L
